definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: This process will certainly open up broad prospects for theoretical innovation.
sentences.chinese: 這一過程必將爲理論創新開闢廣闊前景。

sentences.english: The Lord your God will drive those nations out ahead of you little by little. You will not clear them away all at once .... Deuteronomy 7:22
sentences.chinese: 耶和華你們的神必將這些國的民從你面前漸漸趕出。

sentences.english: "Cotton garment, apparels and even knitwear exports will improve, " Mr Rajagopal said.
sentences.chinese: 印度棉質服裝出口量必將呈現上升趨勢。

sentences.english: The day necessarily will become a pillars just, don't know two how under the idea?
sentences.chinese: 日必將成爲棟樑之才，不知二位意下如何？

sentences.english: Grid-Connected PV System will be the new trend among PV applications.
sentences.chinese: 光伏併網發電系統也必將成爲光伏發展的新趨勢。

sentences.english: Thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter's vessel .
sentences.chinese: 你必將他們如同窯匠的瓦器摔碎。

sentences.english: And the LORD said unto David, Go up: for I will doubtless deliver the Philistines into thine hand.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華說，你可以上去，我必將非利士人交在你手裏。

sentences.english: And it seemed that without a miracle, America's fight for freedom would be doomed.
sentences.chinese: 看起來不會有奇蹟了，美國的爲自由而戰必將勝利。

sentences.english: The coming of automation is bound tohave important social consequences.
sentences.chinese: 自動化的實現必將產生重大的社會影響。

sentences.english: The development of network teaching is necessarily to drive the innovation in hist …
sentences.chinese: 網絡教學的發展與普及必將帶動高中歷史教學的改革。

sentences.english: Desktop computer will be must develop toward fixable location and requirement way.
sentences.chinese: 臺式電腦也必將朝着固化位置與需求的方向發展。

sentences.english: Whoms in sin shall sink in sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 在罪惡中游泳的人，必將在悲哀中沈沒。

sentences.english: The shaft sleeve and mechanical seal can be replaced without removing the shaft from the pump.
sentences.chinese: 軸套和機封的更換不必將軸從泵上拆下來。

sentences.english: He that speaketh sophistically, is hateful: he shall be destitute of every thing.
sentences.chinese: 有的人詭辯，出言可惡，他必將缺乏各種食物。

sentences.english: The implementation of the law of brain death will pr…
sentences.chinese: 實施腦死亡法必將大大促進我國肝臟移植水平的提高。

sentences.english: He that trusts in alie shall perish in truth.
sentences.chinese: 置信謊言的人必將在過失前消亡。
